AT 46.6 IS AN AREA OF ISLANDS AMIDST A FROZEN SEA. THE ISLANDS ARE

I'VE NOTICED THAT THE SKY TURNS A PALE GREEN BEFORE SUNSET.
IT'S ALSO GREEN IN THE MORNING, BUT BLUE DURING THE DAY.
